name: Hot Flash
description:
A personal diary of hot flashes suffered during the COVID lockdown in 2020... made into a game... as I'm slowly learning to accept my new identity as a middle-aged woman.

Created in Twine (Marlowe template) using only 2  "passages" filled with the same variables. 

In order to advance in the game, the player has no choice but to give the protagonist a Hot Flash.
